𒊏 RA 𒊏 ≈ 𒐺𒋰𒈫 ≈ 𒀸𒋰𒁹𒁹 ≈ 𒌷 UR 𒊏 ≈ 𒐺𒋰𒈫 ≈ 𒄿𐎍 I·R / R·AI 𒀸𒋰𒈫 IR ≈ RI 𒊑 𒅕 IR 𒊏 ≈ 𒐺𒋰𒈫 ≈ 𒋰𒈫 ≈ 𒄥 GUR 𒊏 ≈ 𒐺𒋰𒈫 ≈ 𒋰𒈫 ≈ 𒋛 SI ≈ ẓi(RA) ≈ 𒋰𒐺𒈫 ≈ 𒍢 ẓi 𒊏 ≈ 𒐺𒋰𒈫 <> 𒋥 RAD

𒊏 ᶝR ᵞR ᵟR
𒊏 R <> 𒆷 L right left

𒊏 raᵈ in ride

𒊏 raᵗ in 𒄯𒊏 ḪAR-RAᵈᵗ قَرْض qarḍ ^^ კრედიტი ḳrediṭi креди́т credit "loan"

𒊏 raᵏᵗ right (hand) in 𒀀𒁇𒊏 a-bar-raᵏ abaraᵏ عرق ʕaraʾ عرق 'araq •rich "sweat" #zūtu 𒍪𒌓 𒍪 𒌅

𒊏 raᵗ 𒊏𒄴 raᵗah ῥυθμός rhythm <> rattle ?

𒊏 ra /raḫ/ rap #rapāsu rraf “to hit” <> rough
𒊏 rah₂ 𒊏𒄴 ra-ah ῥυθμός rhythm "beat" ῥέω rhéō “flow” 𒊏 rah₂ 𒊏𒄴 ra-ah rrah "beat" @ Albanian #rahāşu

𒋛 Sea 𒈠 Mar 𒈣.𒊏 MA.ra = ship SI 𒋛

𒆷 LA ⇔ RA 𒂆 𒊏 𒋃 Left ⇔ Right ( 𒋃 leg / side )

𒊏 RA ⋍ 𒆷 LA in simplified font 1+2as+2dash / 1+3as+1dash

𒉺𒊏𒁺 pa-ra-du «peur'd» terrified, to be scared
𒉺𒆷𒄷 pa-la-ḫu •pale “revere, to fear”

Euphrates 𒌑𒅁𒊏𒌅𒅖 ú-ip-ra-tu-iš
Euphrates 𐎢𐎳𐎼𐎠𐎬𐎢 (u-f-r-a-tu-u /Ufrātu/)

greabtum 𒊏𒁍𒌈 = great / rabitum 𓅨𓂋𓅆
greabtim 𒊏𒁍𒁴 = great / rabitum 𓅨𓂋𓅆

𒊏 ≈ 𓂠 𓂟 manu in ramānī 𒊏𒈠𒉌 “own” self
𓀀 ⲙⲙⲓⲛ ⲙⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲙⲙⲟ⳼ (my)self ⇔ mono, mine, moi, me 𓀀 ⲙⲙⲓⲛ ⲙⲙⲟ⳼ ⲙⲙⲓⲛⲉ own, proper, self
𓀀 ⲙⲙⲓⲛⲉ ↔ ⲙⲙⲓⲛ self 𓂋 𓂠 𓂟 manu remain ?

𒊏𒅕 ẓiᵖir super : against 𓂋 (sperm)

𒊏𒈠𒆪 ᶝra-ma-ku çimmək “bathe”

𒆍 𒀭 𒊏 𒆠 Bab-Iran/Inri 𓊖 = Babylon

𒍥𒋩𒊏 ZÌ.SUR.RA surround/circula 𒆸𒆸

𒊏𒊏 𒊏𒄴 Raw / rough up: beat with right hand

𒊏𒀪𒁀 𒋾𒈠 ra-aʾ-ba.ti-ma rage (thine)

𒊏𒈬𒌑 ra-mu-ú romance :

𓌸𓂋 amore:romance 𓂋𓌹 reverse forms:
